author: Jack Webber
description: This blackcurrant fruity cocktail has a citrus zing courtesy of the citrus vodka base and the addition of fresh lime juice, the sourness of which adds balance.
name: Webber Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
